author: cbs8
title: Cynopsis Announces Rising Star Awards Finalists and Event Details
text:
Winners will be honored Thursday, October 15 at The Dream Hotel in NYC
New York, NY (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
Cynopsis Media announced the winners of its inaugural Rising Star awards, celebrating media execs whose smarts, ingenuity, and drive are an inspiration in the workplace. This must-attend event will recognize the young professionals bound to serve as their generation's leaders.
"The accomplishments of the winners of Cynopsis' first Rising Star Awards are truly remarkable," said Cynopsis Associate Publisher Roberta Caploe. "These emerging leaders have distinguished themselves early in their careers with innovative thinking that has won the respect of their managers and peers, at a time when new ideas are key to the evolution of the media industry. We look forward to an event that salutes these exceptional individuals, and the companies that have created an environment that allows them to grow and thrive."
The honorees come from media companies including A+E Networks, AT&T AdWorks, Collective Digital Studios, DigitasLBi, Discovery, ESPN, Frank N. Magid Associates, Havas Media, Horizon Media, LeadDog Marketing Group, Maxus Global, MP & Silva, NFL, NHL, Nickelodeon, Pop, Starcom MediaVest, Viacom Velocity, Whistle Sports and more. To view the full list of winners and event information, visit: http://cynopsis.com/event/2015-rising-star-reception/
Winners will be celebrated during an awards reception from 6:30 â€“ 7:30 p.m. following the Cynopsis TV Conference on Thursday, October 15 in New York City. For registration questions, contact Sarah Martinez at sarah(at)cynopsis(dot)com. For sponsorship information or to place a congratulatory ad in the reception program, contact VP of Sales & Marketing Mike Farina at mike(at)cynopsis(dot)com.
About Cynopsis Media:
Cynopsis Media is a division of Access Intelligence LLC. The Cynopsis Media family of products includes Cynopsis, Cynopsis Digital and Cynopsis Sports daily e-publications, weekly Cynopsis Jobs e-publication, Special eReports, Event/Summits and a strong database of Classifieds and more. Visit cynopsis.com .
